summary: This is an email from December 28, 2006, containing flight details for a traveler departing from Newark, NJ to St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands on December 30, 2006. The email mentions the traveler will be accompanied by two other individuals, one named Valdson, and instructs them to meet in the lobby at 6:45am.

persons.name: Valdson
persons.context: Mentioned as a guy who will be traveling with the email recipient and another girl on the flight to St. Thomas.

connections.description: Scheduled to travel together on a flight from Newark to St. Thomas on December 30, 2006.

events.title: Flight from Newark to St. Thomas
events.description: A Continental Airlines flight (1884) is scheduled to depart Newark Liberty International Airport at 9:25am and arrive at Cyril E King Airport in St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands at 2:43pm.

locations: St Thomas Island Cyril E King (STT)
keyFacts: The document is a travel itinerary email dated December 28, 2006, for a flight scheduled for December 30, 2006.
The flight was from Newark, NJ to St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands, a location associated with Jeffrey Epstein's private island.
The email indicates the traveler will be accompanied by at least two others: a man named Valdson and an unnamed girl.
The email instructs the recipient to meet in the lobby at 6:45am, suggesting coordinated group travel.
